radiographic_examinations.findings: Mild atelectasis in the bases of the lungs; normal liver, adrenal glands, spleen, kidneys, pancreas, stomach, duodenum, and small bowel; abnormality in the right lower quadrant with the appendix measuring 1.2 cm with surrounding fat stranding, fluid, and edema; 0.6-cm appendicolith at the base of the appendix; normal urinary bladder with minimal complex pelvic free fluid; no evidence of hydronephrosis; no lytic or blastic lesions in the osseous structures.
